snippet: Wlodzimierz Umaniec, 26, scrawled the phrase "a potential piece of yellowism'' on the artist's 1958 painting "Black on Maroon" at the Tate Modern on Oct. 7.
abstract: Wlodzimierz Umaniec, 26, scrawled the phrase "a potential piece of yellowism'' on the artist's 1958 painting "Black on Maroon" at the Tate Modern on Oct. 7.

headline.main: London Man Pleads Guilty to Vandalizing Rothko Mural
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea in Vandalizing of Rothko Mural
